data.message:
Hahahaha! All you idiots pissed at him and saying you'll never listen to him again...

LATER BITCHES!  

Eminem is still the greatest. I love him even more after this. Trump is the worst thing to happen to America since 9-11.

replies.message: Lol man y'all wild. His shits trash anyway bro! Last shit he did anything decent on was the Eminem show. And that shits old as fuck. His raps are trash now. It's so sad. It's not even worth listening to before this scream for political attention.
Yea idk whats made buisness's boom and stocks go up geeze i wonder who
Trumps the worst thing since 9-11? Care to explain yourself or did you simply hear that on CNN and felt the desire to regurgitate it?
Where was he when Obama was in office....all these problems suddenly the fault of one man. Wake up people get involved don't just let celebs do your work for you....
The 🐸 are out in full force tonight. Rallying against a rapper they don't even care about. 😂😂 I'm enjoying reading the comments. Keyboard warriors.😜
Keyboard warriors? For expressing their opinions? What's that make you? :)

Yet if he said fuck you libtards you crybaby bitches would flood the streets jerking eachother, us? We don't give a fuck, fuck Eminem if he says fuck us, are we gonna bukake in the streets? No we ain't little bitches like you snowflake libtards
Hey guess what Israel Hernandez in the words of eminem fuck off and fuck you we don't need you here.
Baddest rapper ever liveth..... #EminemStrong
Correction: at least 9-11 united the country for like a week.
Trump cut five trillion dollars off the national debt.... so much for being the worst thing that ever happened to America lmfao. You are a puppet for corporate media.
I'm sure Eminem is going to suffer after losing all 5 of his trump supporting fans
Awww did I hurt your wittle feewings? Don't change your gender 50 times over it kiddos, President Trump is your daddy
Maybe you need to move out the us  scrub
Are you that stupid
tRump is a mentally unstable moron and a traitor. Enjoy the impeachment.

Jesse Ashe care to back up that statement with some actual facts! How is trump a traitor?! I am very curious to hear your lib reasoning!!

Let’s see, Obama’s sent millions and millions of dollars of weapons across seas!! Turned his back on the american people every chance he had!!! Put grown ass men in the little girls rooms, tried to violate our constitutional rights, and yet trump is the traitor?!? Please, let’s hear your facts!!!
Nice Mickey! Finally someone who is a REAL fan..❤

So Trump is comparable to a tragedy that killed hundreds-thousands of Americans? Please show me where Trump killed hundreds-thousands of Americans. That would be like me saying you are the worst human next to Hitler. Fucking idiot
Jesse Ashe and when Trump is still President, we'll enjoy your tears
Lol okay... fucking idiot
Libtard at his best!! Comparing the president to a terrorist act that killed thousands. Durrrrr ..time to take your medication from mommy's cabinet
Not saying Trumps great but did you miss the last potus 😂🤣 obummer destroyed America
😂😂😂 still salty huh
